tool_description: Retrieves and filters user's saved wishlist items based on various criteria and sorting preferences.

user_id.description: Unique identifier for the user whose wishlist to retrieve

category_filter.description: Filter items by category (e.g., electronics, clothing, books)

sort_by.description: Sort criteria: date_added, price_low_to_high, price_high_to_low, name

error_messages: Invalid user ID: User ID must be a non-empty string and exist in the system.
Invalid category filter: Category must be one of the supported categories or None.
Invalid sort criteria: Use one of [date_added, price_low_to_high, price_high_to_low, name].
Wishlist access denied: User does not have permission to access this wishlist.
usage: Provide user_id to retrieve their wishlist. Optionally filter by category and specify sorting preference. Returns organized wishlist data with item details.

item_ids.description: Array of item identifiers in the wishlist

item_count.description: Total number of items in the filtered wishlist

last_updated.description: Timestamp when wishlist was last modified
